Plot: A young man's recently deceased girlfriend mysteriously returns from the dead, but he slowly realizes she is not the way he remembered her.
Title: Life After Beth
Actors: Aubrey Plaza, Dane DeHaan, John C. Reilly, Molly Shannon
tomatoConsensus: In spite of Aubrey Plaza's committed performance, Life After Beth remains a sketch-worthy idea that's been uncomfortably stretched to feature length.
